import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import { listProductDetails } from '../actions/productActions' import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from '../components/Message'; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(0); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const { loading, error, product } = productDetails; useEffect( () => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) return ( <> Go back {loading ? : error ? {error} : (

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In stock' : 'Out of stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)}> {[...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map( (x) => ( ) )} )} )} ) } export default ProductScreen
